info.title: Application
info.description: To use the API you must first sign-in using the `POST /auth/sign-in` endpoint and collect the **Bearer token** from the response.

invitationToken.description: This invitation token is sent via email to the user. If they access it via the link, the invitation token is used to auto-accept the invitation to the specific tenant.

tenantId.description: If the user access the application via subdomain, it onboards the user on the tenant passed.

invitationToken.description: This invitation token is sent via email to the user. If they access it via the link, the invitation token is used to auto-accept the invitation to the specific tenant.

tenantId.description: If the user access the application via subdomain, it onboards the user on the tenant passed.

400.description: Sorry, we don't recognize your credentials.

tenantId.description: If the user access the application via subdomain, the email will also be sent using the subdomain.
If the user access the application via subdomain, the email will also be sent using the subdomain.

token.description: The token is the token the user receives via email when he/she asks to reset the password.

400.description: Password reset link is invalid or has expired.

token.description: The token is the token the user receives via email to verify his/her email.

400.description: Email verification link is invalid or has expired.

uploadCredentials.description: Credentials used on the FormData to post the to be uploaded file.

post.description: The webhook is used by Stripe only to notify the application when some event occurs.
Creates a URL for the user to use the Stripe Portal.
Creates a session for the user to use the Stripe Checkout.
